common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Link the existing product to SSP, replacing its info for the ones from the SSP.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region)


NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value \"00\"

","name":"ncm","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"NkGmQNr"},{"description":"

Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

","name":"same_state_cfop","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"YXKwkRE"},{"description":"

Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

","name":"diff_state_cfop","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"erBiacw"},{"description":"

","name":"csosn","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"WJeTSSJ"},{"description":"

Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region).

","name":"origin","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"kymKHdd"},{"description":"

Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)

(BR region)

tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

","name":"tax_type","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"nMTSNWA"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de IntegraÃ§Ã£o Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

","name":"pis","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"iJmkyX"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

COFINS â€“ ContribuiÃ§Ã£o para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

","name":"cofins","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"ePnhbGJ"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre CirculaÃ§Ã£o de Mercadorias e ServiÃ§os (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - CÃ³digo da SituaÃ§Ã£o TributÃ¡ria (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

","name":"icms_cst","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"yiRsTXS"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de IntegraÃ§Ã£o Social) and Cofins (ContribuiÃ§Ã£o para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

","name":"pis_cofins_cst","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"XhQzRHM"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

","name":"federal_state_taxes","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"FmHftCi"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

1: Retailer

2: Manufacturer

","name":"operation_type","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"fmzRtPW"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal EletrÃ´nica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

","name":"ex_tipi","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"dEeYzFt"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

","name":"fci_num","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"WrxeeE"},{"description":"
